name: Fever
summary: Elevated body temperature often caused by infection.
symptoms: High temperature, chills, sweating, headache, body pain, fatigue.
recommended: Drink warm water, soups, herbal teas. Eat soft digestible foods like khichdi, bananas, applesauce, toast.
avoid: Caffeine, alcohol, oily foods, very cold items.

name: Dehydration
summary: Loss of body water and electrolytes.
symptoms: Extreme thirst, dry mouth, dizziness, dark urine.
recommended: ORS solutions, coconut water, buttermilk, water-rich fruits.
avoid: Alcohol, soft drinks, spicy and salty foods.

name: Diarrhea
summary: Frequent loose stools, usually due to infection.
recommended: BRAT diet (banana, rice, applesauce, toast), probiotics, ORS.
avoid: Milk, fatty food, spicy food, caffeine.

name: Constipation
summary: Difficulty passing stools due to low fiber intake or dehydration.
recommended: High-fiber foods, warm water, prunes, leafy greens.
avoid: Fast food, red meat, fried foods.

name: Diabetes
summary: High blood sugar levels due to insulin dysfunction.
recommended: Whole grains, vegetables, dal, sprouts, low GI fruits.
avoid: Sugar, sweets, bakery foods, sugary drinks.

name: Hypertension
summary: High blood pressure due to stress, salt, or lifestyle habits.
symptoms: Headache, dizziness, blurred vision (sometimes no symptoms).
recommended: Low-sodium diet, fruits, vegetables, oats, beetroot.
avoid: Salty snacks, pickles, fried foods, caffeine.

name: Thyroid
symptoms: Fatigue, weight change, hair fall, mood changes.

name: Cold & Cough
summary: Viral infection causing congestion and coughing.
symptoms: Runny nose, sore throat, cough, sneezing.
recommended: Warm soups, turmeric milk, ginger tea, honey.
avoid: Cold drinks, ice creams, fried foods.

name: Acidity
recommended: Buttermilk, bananas, coconut water, bland foods.

name: Anemia
recommended: Iron-rich foods like spinach, beetroot, jaggery.

name: Migraine
summary: Severe recurring headaches often with nausea.
symptoms: Throbbing headache, sensitivity to light or sound.
recommended: Hydration, magnesium-rich food, almonds, ginger tea.

name: PCOS
recommended: High-fiber foods, lean protein, nuts, omega-3 foods.

name: Obesity
recommended: High-protein foods, vegetables, fruits, whole grains.

name: Gastritis
recommended: Coconut water, curd rice, bland meals, soft fruits.

name: Vitamin D Deficiency
summary: Low vitamin D levels affecting bones and immunity.
recommended: Sun exposure, fortified milk, eggs, mushrooms.
